rukus.text: Wa Laqad 'Arsalna Musa Bi'ayatina 'Ila Fir`awna Wa Mala'ihi Faqala 'Inni Rasulu Rabbi Al-`Alamina
Falamma Ja'ahum Bi'ayatina 'Idha Hum Minha YaÄ‘hakuna
Wa Ma Nurihim Min 'Ayatin 'Illa Hiya 'Akbaru Min 'Ukhtiha Wa 'Akhadhnahum Bil-`Adhabi La`allahum Yarji`una
Wa Qalu Ya 'Ayyuha As-Sahiru Ad`u Lana Rabbaka Bima `Ahida `Indaka 'Innana Lamuhtadun
Wa Nada Fir`awnu Fi Qawmihi Qala Ya Qawmi 'Alaysa Li Mulku Misra Wa Hadhihi Al-'Anharu Tajri Min Tahti 'Afala Tubsiruna
Am 'Ana Khayrun Min Hadha Al-Ladhi Huwa Mahinun Wa La Yakadu Yubinu
Falawla 'Ulqiya `Alayhi 'Aswiratun Min Dhahabin 'Aw Ja'a Ma`ahu Al-Mala'ikatu Muqtarinina
Fastakhaffa Qawmahu Fa'ata`uhu 'Innahum Kanu Qawmaan Fasiqina
